attr.title: Daydreamer
attr.desc: A minimalistic boss battle shmup that truly challenges your skills with 18 bosses, each with its own challenging pattern. This is a strategy shmup that is on another level! You will die a lot!
attr.inst: Download from Nizakashii https://nizakashii.itch.io/daydreamer  Locate and place data.win & both .ogg files into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download from [Nizakashii](https://nizakashii.itch.io/daydreamer) Locate and place data.win & both .ogg files into gamedata folder.
